article_title: Employee Share Of Health Care Costs Keeps Climbing
article_text:
There’s news today that while companies’ health care costs have risen at the slowest rate in two decades, the amount that employees are having to contribute toward their health care is skyrocketing.

Sarah Kliff, who oversees health, medicine and education coverage for Vox, has been watching this trend for a while, and joins Here & Now’s Indira Lakshmanan with details.

By Sarah Kliff: I thought people should shop more for health care. Then I actually tried it.

Guest

Sarah Kliff, senior editor at Vox.com who covers health care. She tweets @sarahkliff.
